effect.gold_silver: Heals the user for half its max HP. During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP. During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
effect.crystal: Heals the user for half its max HP. During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP. During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.

short_effect.gold_silver: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.
short_effect.crystal: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.
